Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-28180 affecting package moby-containerd for versions less than 1.6.26-9
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-28180 affecting package moby-containerd for versions less than 1.6.26-9. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package moby-containerd is earlier than 1.6.26-9, affected by CVE-2024-28180
